Package InternshipSystem

Class StudentEntity

Object
UserEntity
StudentEntity
public class StudentEntity extends UserEntity
Represents a student in the internship placement system. Extends the UserEntity class to include student-specific attributes and behaviors.

  • Field Summary

    • StudentEntity

      public StudentEntity(String id, String name, String major, int year, String email)
      Constructs a StudentEntity with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the student.
      name - The name of the student.
      major - The major of the student.
      year - The year of study of the student.
      email - The email address of the student.

    • canApply

      public boolean canApply()
      Checks if the student is eligible to apply for more internships.
      Returns:
      true if the student can apply for more internships, false otherwise.
